rules.prepare:
cd "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR" autoreconf -vfi || true
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR"
AWK="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/awk" \ PERL="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/perl" \ "./configure" \ --prefix="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" \ --build="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --host="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --disable-nls \ --disable-rpath
# prevent this from being re-generated touch texindex/texindex.awk
